Try one of these More More Peruvian authorities raided the home of President Dina Boluarte as part of an investigation into possible illicit enrichment after she was spotted wearing luxury watches at public appearances. Highly pathogenic avian influenza has been discovered in dairy herds in Michigan and Idaho, indicating the virus is spreading into new US states. Investors in London’s office market have been desperately hoping for signs of improvement. Moves to pull two heavily discounted deals to bet on a price recovery may provide them. Ukraine will keep targeting Russian oil-refining facilities with domestically-made drones despite US discontent with its campaign, according to President Volodymyr Zelenskiy. Kenya’s earnings from tourism surged 32% to 352.5 billion shillings ($2.7 billion) last year as increased arrivals drove revenue to the highest since the onset of the Covid-19 pandemic. {{ video.ContentPackages[0].ScheduleStartDateTime | fromNow }} {{ currentStream.Desc }}
